game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find the ancient artifact hidden in the ruins.
game.description: In this quest, you must explore the mysterious ruins in the heart of the jungle to uncover the lost artifact. Beware of the dangers that lie ahead!
game.reward: 1000 experience points and a rare magical item

task.description: Locate and enter the entrance to the ancient ruins.
task.location: Jungle Clearing, West of Lake Eriador

task.description: Solve the puzzles on the hieroglyph-covered walls to unlock the artifact's chamber.
